title: The Best of The Herd
itunes:title: The Best of The Herd
description:
Welcome into the Best of Herd Podcast with Colin Cowherd! Colin explains that the Hall of Fame is slowly turning into the Hall Of Very Good, NFL Playoff seeding still in flux going into week 17, College Playoff preview and which teams to look out for, and another edition of "Colin's Blazin' 5 - NFL Picks". Plus, Colin gives you his 2022 New Year's Resolutions!


Guest: Matt Leinart

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
